item.title: Logistics
item.description: Logistics AI technologies in logistics are not a luxury but a necessity for organizations to remain competitive in terms of service excellence and pricing. According to Forbes research, 65% of the industry leaders believe that logistics and transportation, have entered an era of profound transformation. Key application domains for AI in logistics include demand forecasting, warehousing, fleet & route optimization and predictive maintenance. Freight delivery & warehousing Predictive maintenance (e.
